DOC.brief_summary: The aim of this observational study is to document the therapeutic use of PASCALLERG 速 for hay fever. Based on the survey is a decrease in disease-specific symptoms when taking PASCALLERG 速 over a period of 4 weeks will be documented. In addition to the compatibility can be assessed.
DOC.brief_title: Observational Study With PASCALLERG 速 in Patients With Hay Fever
DOC.detailed_description: There are documented male and female patients over the age of one year who suffer from hay fever. The traetment time is about a period of 4 weeks with PASCALLERG速 tablets.
DOC.criteria: hay fever Lactose intolerance and / or Chromium hypersensitivity
